message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you! I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we're just getting started, I'm willing to make a generous offer to get us off on the right foot. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1200000. This is a great deal, considering the product's true value to you is $1500000. What do you think?

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, and I'm interested in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me. What do you think?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1100000. This is a compromise that still reflects the product's value to me, while also showing that I'm willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it at that price. What do you think?

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I understand that you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $1050000. This is the absolute minimum I'm willing to accept, and I'm only offering it to you because I believe the product will bring significant value to your business. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to make a deal. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above $1050000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $980000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it at that price. What do you think?

Bob, I understand that you're still trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $1050000. I've already made a significant concession to meet you halfway, and I'm not willing to give up any more value. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need you to meet me at $1030000. This is my final offer. If you're willing to accept, I'll make the deal. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
